subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Baltimore Orioles have hired Phil Niekro, who won 318 games in a 24-year career, to help the team transform three pitchers into full-time knuckleballers.
snippet: The Baltimore Orioles have hired Phil Niekro, who won 318 games in a 24-year career, to help the team transform three pitchers into full-time knuckleballers.
